line_1: "O never fear. " — Don't look so grim,
line_2: You seem dispos'd my back to trim;

line_1: Dull grew the goblet's sheen, and grim
line_2: And colourless banners aloft hung dim,

line_1: To call the sheeted spectre grim,
line_2: Oft wont from charnels damp and dim

line_1: Now Death appears all horrible and grim:
line_2: But the next Moment none so fair as him,
